name: Theater Tickets
desc:
Exquisitely-made souvenir tickets meant to memorialize participation in the various events related to the Fontinalia Film Festival. These tickets are said to be made to have a similar texture to film slides. Crystal-clear when reflecting light, they resemble nothing so much as thin gem fragments...

Use these to unlock various rewards during the "Roses and Muskets" event.

value.text:
Version 4.3 Event - Roses and Muskets
Activity - Thousand-Pace Interdiction Arcminute Sharpshooting Zone
Activity - Trick Shots, Tricky Lights
Activity - Xtreme Drive
Activity - Into the Frame

customize.name: Theater Tickets
customize.desc:
Exquisitely-made souvenir tickets meant to memorialize participation in the various events related to the Fontinalia Film Festival. These tickets are said to be made to have a similar texture to film slides. Crystal-clear when reflecting light, they resemble nothing so much as thin gem fragments...

Use these to unlock various rewards during the "Roses and Muskets" event.

customize.name: Ultimate Overlord's Mega Magic Sword
customize.desc: A magical sword that can only be wielded by the ultimate overlord who rules the seas. As it has been made with special water-resistant materials, it will not get ruined by water damage even after being immersed. Why, one might even call it invincible!

customize.name: Theater Tickets
customize.desc:
Exquisitely-made souvenir tickets meant to memorialize participation in the various events related to the Fontinalia Film Festival. These tickets are said to be made to have a similar texture to film slides. Crystal-clear when reflecting light, they resemble nothing so much as thin gem fragments...

Use these to unlock various rewards during the "Roses and Muskets" event.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Super-Duper Invincible Shining Sparkly Magic Crystal
customize.desc:
Specialized refinement material for "Ultimate Overlord's Mega Magic Sword."

Can gather many wishes (including super cool cardboard ones) and put them together, forming an ultimate super-duper mysterious power.

Though you can buy a toy version in Damoville Purveyor that looks similar (okay, basically exactly the same), in reality, there is (probably) a qualitative difference between the two, so definitely don't mix them up!

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
customize.desc:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Legend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.

customize.name: Crown of Insight
customize.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.
